text_block_list.text:
We'd come to the summer training camp. Mejiro Palmer was 
not only dedicated to her training, but running cheerfully, 
embracing her unique running style.
Everything was going smoothly, or so it seemed…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer, you can go ahead and rest, all right? 
Aren't you thirsty? Don't worry about me, just take 
a break, 'kay?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Wait, you look a little flushed?! Let's find some shade, quickly! 
Didn't we have a wet towel somewhere around here…?!

In a rush, she dashes off before I can tell her to calm down. 
… What on earth has her so panicked?

She had always been considerate, but her way 
of being so had always been more subtle…
—— Could it be because…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, alright, alright. Complaints, huh? 
But if someone went out of their way for 
that during our training session, then…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
It's probably about my running, right? 
Hmm, okay! Well, I can kinda understand why!

Could it be she's worrying about that time…? 
If that's the case, I can't leave things as they are.

It was my fault for letting it slip. I should be 
the one showing concern. I want Mejiro Palmer 
to feel unrestrained and at ease.

…… If I remember correctly, wasn't there a festival tonight? 
Maybe it'd be a good opportunity to invite Mejiro Palmer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Woooow! Look at the crowd! There are 
even more food stalls than I expected!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Trainer, anything you feel like eating? 
Or do you want to check out the games first? 
I'm down for anyth—
choice_data_list: What do you want to do?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Huh, me? Umm… that's okay, I'm more 
interested in what you want to—
choice_data_list: I want to do what you want to do, together.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Eh, ah… um? Eeehh? 
But, I don't really, uhh…
choice_data_list: …… If you don't want to, we don't have to.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
No, it's not that I don't want to! I don't mind at all! Not one bit! 
How about, umm… target practice! Let's start with that! 
Sounds fun, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, is there anything you got your eyes on? 
Trust me, I'll win it for you no matter what!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
…… Sorry. I missed… every shot. That's so weird… 
why did they go off in the wrong direction? …Hm?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Whoa!? You scored!? Sick! You're a natural at this, Trainer!! 
How'd you do that!? That's next level!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Really? I can choose something? Then… how about 
the rigged looking one way at the top. Wait, no, no, no! 
You should pick something you like, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
This shape cutting game's savage! And I was so sure 
that I was going to win you something this time……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
How's it going on your end, Trainer? 
Oh, you're almost there! Careful, gently…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ehh!? But this is the most important part?! 
No… I'm up for the challenge. I won't let you down!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ah?! It broke!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
…… Ahaha! Trainer, the look on your face… 
Oh man, that's hilarious…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Don't sweat it, we'll get it next time! Hey, there's a water balloon 
fishing game over there! Let's have a go at it together!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, that was a blast…… We played so much, 
and ate until my stomach gave out. Pure bliss♪
choice_data_list: I'm glad you had a good time.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: …… Turns out, I made you worry about me, after all. Sorry. You've noticed that I've been acting strange lately, right?
choice_data_list: <size=34>Is it because of what we talked about last time…?</size>

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Hmm? Ahh, you mean the thing with the other trainer? 
No, no, that's not bothering me at all!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
It's just… I was thinking, it's strange to always be the one 
being supported. Yeah, I mean, I know it's part of your job.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to give back to match your support with my effort, 
but look where it led me. Ahaha, talk about backfiring!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
It seems like I was too worried about being a burden. Sorry for 
making you feel concerned. Gosh, this is embarrassing…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: But, you know… the thought of burdening you ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: … Eh? That… Wait, hang on.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(You've taken on the job of a trainer. 
With such seriousness, such sincerity.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(Ever since you found yourself a horsegirl… 
Ever since you've truly become a "trainer".)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (That's why, as a trainer……)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (…… As my trainer……?)
I'm glad I became your trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(You take on your duties as a trainer… but it's not that 
you find happiness in simply becoming a trainer.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (… You find happiness… in becoming my trainer?)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(Y-You're happy to support me, as a trainer… 
is what that means, right…?!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ahhh… aahhhh…!
choice_data_list: <size=34>Palmer!? Did you eat too much?! Have a fever?!</size>

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: …… Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
…… I'm gonna give it everything. I'm gonna run 
my legs off, I'm gonna win big. For real.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
I wanna show everyone what we're all 
about and win, proving ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: … Proving that you made the right choice in being my trainer!!

I vowed to Mejiro Palmer that I'd make her say, 
"I'm glad you became my trainer!" ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhh……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ubwuuu… my trainer, you're incredible…

Is it the heat? I try to fan the collapsed 
Mejiro Palmer, wondering.

Stealing a glance at my frantic efforts, Mejiro Palmer, 
cheeks still flushed, lets out a soft, amused laugh.
